meanings.definition: To cover with a new roof.
meanings.sent1: We are reroofing our house to make it look new.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers are reroofing the building after the storm damage.
meanings.sent3: The reroofing project turned into a fun family activity.
meanings.sent4: Reroofing the house felt like giving it a fresh hat.
meanings.sent5: The sound of reroofing echoed through the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: The act of replacing or repairing a roof.
meanings.sent1: The reroofing of the old barn saved it from further decay.
meanings.sent2: After the reroofing, the house looked brand new.
meanings.sent3: The reroofing job was so well done that it became the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: The reroofing was like a makeover for the building.
meanings.sent5: The reroofing process took longer than expected but was worth it in the end.
